content.question: Changes in the overall number of nuclear weapons shown in the table contributed most directly to which of the following international developments?

choices.label: Revolutionary movements in colonized African countries
Mass violence caused by ethnic or ideological conflicts
Institutions investing in economic development in newly independent nations
International efforts to promote peace and security

content.answer: International efforts to promote peace and security
